channel.title: Visual Question Answering on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Visual Question Answering on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Parallel Backpropagation for Shared-Feature Visualization
item.description: Researchers visualized shared visual features driving responses of body-selective neurons to non-body objects, revealing object parts resembling macaque body parts, thus explaining neural preferences.
